purpose: Contributor-facing roadmap focused on planning, tracking, and coordinating short-term work grounded in the current repository snapshot.

milestones.title: Parallel execution - design & validation
milestones.problem_coordinated: Coordinate decisions and work required to introduce reliable parallel task execution semantics and a testable executor API (threads/processes/executor abstraction).
work_items: Define executor API shape and behavior in `taskflow/core.py`
Add unit tests for concurrent execution (extend `tests/test_core.py`)
Prototype a simple thread-based executor in `taskflow/experimental/`
Update `README.md` and examples with parallel-execution docs
can_be_done_in_parallel: Add unit tests for expected semantics

milestones.title: Storage layer refactor & pluggable backends
milestones.problem_coordinated: Coordinate a migration from the current in-memory store to a pluggable, testable storage API so stateful features can rely on stable persistence semantics.
work_items: Extract a `Storage` interface and keep current `_STORE` behind an adapter
Add a file/sqlite in-repo backend implementation and unit tests
Add CI unit tests exercising new backends
can_be_done_in_parallel: Write unit tests for loader/save behavior

milestones.title: CLI expansion & contributor-friendly commands
milestones.problem_coordinated: Coordinate expansion of the command-line surface and ensure contributors can exercise and demo features via CLI for onboarding and reproducible test scenarios.
work_items: Improve CLI help text and examples in `README.md`

milestones.title: Stabilize experimental DAG & scheduler
milestones.problem_coordinated: Coordinate the effort to document, harden, and either integrate or clearly mark as experimental the `dag` and `scheduler` modules so contributors know how to use or evolve them.
work_items: Add integration and unit tests for DAG and scheduler behavior
Document public API and intended guarantees in `README.md`
Decide and document whether to promote or keep experimental
can_be_done_in_parallel: Add tests for DAG topology and scheduling rules

milestones.title: Error handling & test-coverage hardening
milestones.problem_coordinated: Coordinate improvements to error propagation, deterministic failure modes, and test coverage so contributors can make safe changes without regressions.
work_items: Add tests exercising failure & cleanup paths
Define and document expected exception types/semantics
Add CI checks to fail on reduced coverage
can_be_done_in_parallel: Add unit tests for `core.run` failure modes
Add tests for storage error handling

independent_workstreams: Docs & README updates (M1, M2, M3, M4)
Adding unit tests for separate modules (M1, M2, M3, M5)
blocking_relationships: M4 (experimental scheduler) should wait for M2 (storage refactor) for persistent-backed features and M1 for executor semantics if scheduler will run tasks in parallel
M1 can proceed without M2 but long-lived scheduler/stateful features should rely on M2

how_to_use_this_roadmap: Pick one milestone and open a small, focused PR that targets its listed files; update `README.md` and add tests. Use the `blocked_by` field to avoid doing work that depends on unresolved refactors.
